appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read data in your company or school directory, such as users, groups, and apps.
Allows the app to read and write all domain properties without a signed in user.  Also allows the app to add,  verify and remove domains.
Allows the app to read and write data in your company or school directory, such as users, and groups.  Does not allow user or group deletion.
Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user.  Does not allow device creation, device deletion or update of device alternative security identifiers.
Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.

Allows the app to create other applications, and fully manage those applications (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any apps that it is not an owner of.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to information in the directory as the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Access the directory as the signed-in user
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to information in your work or school directory as you do.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read data in your company or school directory, such as users, groups, and apps.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read data in your company or school directory, such as other users, groups and apps.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your company or school directory, such as users, and groups.  Does not allow user or group deletion.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your company or school directory, such as other users, groups.  Does not allow user or group deletion on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create groups on behalf of the signed-in user and read all group properties and memberships. Additionally, this allows the app to update group properties and memberships for the groups the signed-in user owns.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create groups on your behalf and read all group properties and memberships. Additionally, this allows the app to update group properties and memberships for groups you own.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read basic group properties and memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties of all users in your company or school, on behalf of the signed-in user. Additionally, this allows the app to read the profiles of the signed-in user's reports and manager.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties of all users in your company or school, on your behalf.  Additionally, this allows the app to read the profiles of your reports and manager.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of all users in your company or school on behalf of the signed-in user. Includes display name, first and last name, photo, and email address. Additionally, this allows the app to read basic info about the signed-in user's reports and manager.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your company or school, on your behalf. Includes display name, first and last name, photo, and email address. Additionally, this allows the app to read basic info about your reports and manager.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allow the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Sign in and read user profile
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your work account and let the app read your profile. It also allows the app to read basic company information.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units on behalf of the signed-in user, for those hidden groups and administrative units that the signed-in user has access to.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups or administrative units on your behalf, for those hidden groups or administrative units that you have access to.
